name: Catan VR
summary:
NOW ON QUEST & QUEST 2! 

Catan VR allows tabletop fans and new players alike to experience the best-selling board game in a fresh, fully-immersive format. Take on other players around the world or play against Catan personalities and watch the island come to life in VR for the first time. Catan VR brings everything board gamers love to the Oculus Rift, Oculus Go and Oculus Quest. 

Classic Catan Gameplay, Now in VR – Experience the award-winning strategy classic for the first time in virtual reality....
